alert.note: Alert for West Slopes North Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 27 at 3:54AM PST until November 27 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST THIS MORNING ABOVE 2500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 2500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to one to three inches. * WHERE...Cascade mountains and valleys of Whatcom and Skagit Counties, including Maple Falls, the Mount Baker Ski Area, Newhalem, Lyman, and Concrete. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes North Cascades and Passes
